amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the High Density Urban Area Security Initiative by $450 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered three printed in the Congressional Record to increase by $450,000,000 the Office for State and Local Government Coordination and Preparedness.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sweeney amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 237 (Roll no. 266).
